messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Fat Egg Garden XLVI, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Fat Egg Garden XLVI, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Fat Egg Garden XLVI. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Alberto Bicknell (Head of Security)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Goodwin Potter is now a Security Guard, i cant change job title on his card but he is now a secuirty guard with permisions set by me, he should be treated as such, thank you for your time. -Alberto Bicknell, HOS</font>
